content: For release on delivery        7:15 p.m. EDT   April 4, 2011      Clearinghouses, Financial Stability, and Financial Reform         Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     2011 Financial Markets Conference     sponsored by the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta     Stone Mountain, Georgia                 April 4, 2011
